      • getCountriesArrivedbyPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountriesArrivedbyPath(Country country,
                                                              Country firstCountry,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<Country> countries)
        This method is used to get all accessible countries of the country player chooses to move armies from
        Parameters:
        country - The country which is being checked to find all accessible countries to it
        firstCountry - The country the player chooses to move armies from
        countries - The list that saves all countries accessible to the country the player chooses
        Returns:
        The list of accessible countries corresponding to the country

      • isCountryDuplicated

        public boolean isCountryDuplicated(Country country,
                                   Country firstCountry,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Country> countries)
        This method is used to check if the country accessible is already in the result list And avoid adding the origin country the player choose to the result list
        Parameters:
        country - The country which is being checked to find all accessible countries to it
        firstCountry - The country the player chooses to move armies from
        countries - The list that saves all countries accessible to the country the player chooses
        Returns:
        true if the country accessible is not in the result list; otherwise return false

      • isAnyCountriesConnected

        public boolean isAnyCountriesConnected()
        This method checks if there is any country has accessible countries and the country which has accessible countries has enough armies for move
        Returns:
        true if there is a country which has accessible countries and it has enough armies for move. Otherwise, return false.

        Parameters:

        secondCountry - The second country the player selected
        Returns:

      • validateDiceSelections

        public boolean validateDiceSelections(java.lang.Integer attackDice,
                                      java.lang.Integer defendDice)
        This method is used to validate if both attacker and defender select how many dice to roll
        Parameters:
        attackDice - The number of dice attacker chooses to roll
        defendDice - The number of dice defender chooses to roll
        Returns:
        returns true if defender and attacker both selected how many dice to roll. Otherwise, return false

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • attack

        public void attack(Country attack,
                   Country defend,
                   int caseType)
        This method is used to decrease the army amount or change the owner of country when it is occupied In case1, the defender lost in dice so it lost 1 army In case2, the attacker conquered the defender, so the owner of defender changes In case3, the attacker lost in dice so it lost 1 army
        Parameters:
        attack - country that is attacking
        defend - country being attacked
        caseType - the type of attack

      • reinforce

        public void reinforce(Country myCountry,
                      int Armyinput)
        This method is necessary for reinforcement The number of armies in the country will be add with the number the player inputs
        Parameters:
        myCountry - the country to be reinforced
        Armyinput - the number of army to reinforce

      • fortify

        public void fortify(Country from,
                    Country to,
                    int Armyinput)
        This method is necessary for fortify a countrys
        Parameters:
        from - The country which the player moves the armies from
        to - The country which the player moves the armies to
        Armyinput - The number of armies to move
